features.situation: to HT rolls made for survival at -HP or below, and on any HT roll where failure means instant death. If this bonus makes the difference between success and failure, you collapse, apparently dead (or disabled), but come to in the usual amount of time. A successful Diagnosis roll reveals the truth.

from sapient being with whom you actively interact (converse, lecture, etc.)
on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun
to initiative rolls for your side (+2 if you are the leader)
to rolls to use Demonological abilities
to rolls to use Demonological abilities

dc4652d6-ca12-4f12-bc7e-b10dca7d54a2.name: Unfazeable
dc4652d6-ca12-4f12-bc7e-b10dca7d54a2.notes: Exempt from fright checks. Reaction modifiers do not affect you.

70588da9-24c5-42bb-b7a7-3a6a771c68cc.name: High Pain Threshold
70588da9-24c5-42bb-b7a7-3a6a771c68cc.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured

features.situation: on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning

007017ca-ec17-4a39-85de-79d2564456d9.name: Luck
007017ca-ec17-4a39-85de-79d2564456d9.notes: Usable once per hour of play

1bed0da8-f236-46a6-9569-cd604c2f6f10.name: Signature Gear
1bed0da8-f236-46a6-9569-cd604c2f6f10.notes: For equipment normally bought with money, each point gives goods worth up to 50% of the average campaign starting wealth (but never cash).

features.situation: from those who hold you in high regard for being a , in a Feared way.

8abb11c1-a0a0-4057-8ab8-d6c490acd27e.name: Weapon Bond (@Knife or Sword@)
8abb11c1-a0a0-4057-8ab8-d6c490acd27e.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

d280354c-42cc-402e-8035-fa1cce006aaf.name: Curious
d280354c-42cc-402e-8035-fa1cce006aaf.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

cd9626ac-806b-437f-aa23-547705fec35c.name: Loner
cd9626ac-806b-437f-aa23-547705fec35c.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever anyone lingers nearby, watches over your shoulder, etc. If you fail, you lash out at that person just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: to resist Influence skills: Diplomacy, Fast-Talk, Intimidation, Savoir-Faire, Sex Appeal, and Streetwise

16f27413-3bdd-4921-b19c-45ff821f39a5.name: Obsession
16f27413-3bdd-4921-b19c-45ff821f39a5.notes: @become the world's most powerful demonologist, or destroy all beings of a specific type, etc@

7075db83-83f7-4678-8f14-c21afdc59292.name: Overconfidence
7075db83-83f7-4678-8f14-c21afdc59292.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are

4d5facde-bbb4-4bf0-84b0-d7cec0f399a7.name: Social Stigma (Excommunicated)
4d5facde-bbb4-4bf0-84b0-d7cec0f399a7.notes: Helpful clerical spells (such as healing) work at -3 on you. Harmful ones aren’t affected!

3e71350e-62a7-4e50-af2c-c008e6cbbf8b.name: Another -25 points chosen from among the previous traits, and/or:

from most people and animals (although pests or carrion-eating scavengers might be attracted to you!)

2228261e-3c5c-45a7-916f-ad4fa6af89c3.name: Bloodlust
2228261e-3c5c-45a7-916f-ad4fa6af89c3.notes: You must make a self-control roll whenever you need to accept a surrender, evade a sentry, take a prisoner, etc.

features.situation: from past victims and anyone with Empathy
to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture
toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)
from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident

b97faa9b-d9b3-4f3d-8f87-b9a78b8b19ec.name: Odious Personal Habit
b97faa9b-d9b3-4f3d-8f87-b9a78b8b19ec.notes:
@Taste for darkly bizarre discussion topics; Inability to lose the bloodstains; etc.@
Take at -5. -10, or -15

features.situation: toward any stranger and any “legitimate” reaction penalty (e.g., for an unfriendly race or nationality) is doubled

819ab6fb-fe87-428f-bbd9-22640a914fe8.name: Phantom Voices
819ab6fb-fe87-428f-bbd9-22640a914fe8.notes: In any situation that the GM feels is stressful, he may roll 3d. On a 6 or less, you hear voices. The GM will always roll whenever you miss a Fright Check or make the roll exactly, and whenever you fail a self-control roll for another stress-related disadvantage.

bada3374-b39c-40bb-84b4-cd73bce0dd2d.name: Selfish
bada3374-b39c-40bb-84b4-cd73bce0dd2d.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

8af8b36a-7b46-42ff-a3ac-b4c277fbedb4.name: Unfit
8af8b36a-7b46-42ff-a3ac-b4c277fbedb4.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate

features.situation: to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc

bad64bea-d833-43b0-a552-36f74100783e.name: Very Unfit
bad64bea-d833-43b0-a552-36f74100783e.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate and recover FP at only half the normal rate

features.situation: -2 to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc.

df3167d2-0500-408e-a82c-ec4d9e154831.notes: Enemis defend at +1 against your third or later use.
